mapper.select:
select id,resid,rescode,title,fromflag,time,imgpath,filesuffix from ( select max(t.id)as id ,t.objid as resid ,max(t.createtime) as time, 1 as fromflag,p.mtype ,a.name as title,a.ResourceId as rescode,a.AssetPath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(AssetPath),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(AssetPath))-1)) as fileSuffix from j_userlog t LEFT JOIN z_asset a on a.id = t.objid LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = a.unifyTypeId where t.logtypecode in ('asset','sharedres') and t.opertypecode = 'view' and a.flag = false and t.userid =#{userId} and t.flag = false and t.isflag = 0 GROUP BY objid
union ALL
select max(t.id)as id ,t.objid as resid ,max(t.createtime) as time, 0 as fromflag,p.mtype ,z.title,z.rescode,CONCAT(z.FPath,'\\\\',z.Fname) as imgPath,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(fname))-1)) as fileSuffix from j_userlog t LEFT JOIN z_resource z on z.id = t.objid LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = z.mtype where t.logtypecode = 'resource' and t.opertypecode = 'view' and z.flag= false and t.userid = #{userId} and t.flag = false and t.isflag = 0 GROUP BY objid
union ALL
select max(t.id)as id ,t.objid as resid ,max(t.createtime) as time, if(t.logtypecode='districtres',4,3) as fromflag,p.mtype ,r.title,r.rescode,r.fullpath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(fname))-1)) as fileSuffix from j_userlog t LEFT JOIN z_districts_resource r on r.id = t.objid LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = r.unifyTypeId where t.logtypecode in ('districtres','schoolres') and r.flag =false and t.userid = #{userId} and t.flag = false and t.isflag = 0 GROUP BY objid )temp_tab where 1 =1
and EXISTS ( select id from x_resourcetype where (id = #{unifyTypeId}>0 or pid = #{unifyTypeId}>0 )and flag =false and id = temp_result.unifyTypeId )
and EXISTS (select FormatCode from j_filetypedetail where flag = false and FileFormat =#{fileFormat} and FormatCode = CONCAT('.',temp_result.filesuffix))
ORDER BY time desc
